00075 /* comefrom: drawTaxesCollected incBoxValue decBoxValue drawCurrentFunds
00076              drawActualBox updateFunds updateCurrentCost */
00077 void Micropolis::makeDollarDecimalStr(char *numStr, char *dollarStr)
00078 {
00079     register short leftMostSet;
00080     short numOfDigits;
00081     short numOfChars;
00082     register short numOfCommas;
00083     register short dollarIndex = 0;
00084     register short numIndex = 0;
00085     register short x;
00086 
00087     numOfDigits = (short)strlen(numStr);
00088 
00089     if (numOfDigits == 1) {
00090         dollarStr[0] = '$';
00091         dollarStr[1] = numStr[ 0 ];
00092         dollarStr[2] = 0;
00093         return;
00094     } else if (numOfDigits == 2) {
00095         dollarStr[0] = '$';
00096         dollarStr[1] = numStr[0];
00097         dollarStr[2] = numStr[1];
00098         dollarStr[3] = 0;
00099         return;
00100     } else if (numOfDigits == 3) {
00101         dollarStr[0] = '$';
00102         dollarStr[1] = numStr[0];
00103         dollarStr[2] = numStr[1];
00104         dollarStr[3] = numStr[2];
00105         dollarStr[4] = 0;
00106     } else {
00107         leftMostSet = numOfDigits % 3;
00108 
00109         if (leftMostSet == 0) {
00110             leftMostSet = 3;
00111         }
00112 
00113         numOfCommas = (numOfDigits - 1) / 3;
00114 
00115         /* add 1 for the dollar sign */
00116         numOfChars = numOfDigits + numOfCommas + 1;
00117 
00118         dollarStr[numOfChars] = 0;
00119 
00120         dollarStr[dollarIndex++] = '$';
00121 
00122         for (x = 1; x <= leftMostSet; x++) {
00123             dollarStr[dollarIndex++] = numStr[numIndex++];
00124         }
00125 
00126         for (x = 1; x <= numOfCommas; x++) {
00127             dollarStr[dollarIndex++] = ',';
00128             dollarStr[dollarIndex++] = numStr[numIndex++];
00129             dollarStr[dollarIndex++] = numStr[numIndex++];
00130             dollarStr[dollarIndex++] = numStr[numIndex++];
00131         }
00132 
00133     }
00134 }
00135 
00140 void Micropolis::pause()
00141 {
00142     if (!simPaused) {
00143         simPausedSpeed = simSpeedMeta;
00144         setSpeed(0);
00145         simPaused = true;
00146     }
00147 
00148     // Call back even if the state did not change.
00149     callback("update", "s", "paused");
00150 }
00151 
00156 void Micropolis::resume()
00157 {
00158     if (simPaused) {
00159         simPaused = false;
00160         setSpeed(simPausedSpeed);
00161     }
00162 
00163     // Call back even if the state did not change.
00164     callback("update", "s", "paused");
00165 }
00166 
00167 
00168 void Micropolis::setSpeed(short speed)
00169 {
00170     if (speed < 0) {
00171         speed = 0;
00172     } else if (speed > 3) {
00173         speed = 3;
00174     }
00175 
00176     simSpeedMeta = speed;
00177 
00178     if (simPaused) {
00179         simPausedSpeed = simSpeedMeta;
00180         speed = 0;
00181     }
00182 
00183     simSpeed = speed;
00184 
00185     callback("update", "s", "speed");
00186 }
00187 
00188 
00189 void Micropolis::setPasses(int passes)
00190 {
00191     simPasses = passes;
00192     simPass = 0;
00193     callback("update", "s", "passes");
00194 }

00200 void Micropolis::setGameLevelFunds(GameLevel level)
00201 {
00202     switch (level) {
00203 
00204         default:
00205         case LEVEL_EASY:
00206             setFunds(20000);
00207             setGameLevel(LEVEL_EASY);
00208             break;
00209 
00210         case LEVEL_MEDIUM:
00211             setFunds(10000);
00212             setGameLevel(LEVEL_MEDIUM);
00213             break;
00214 
00215         case LEVEL_HARD:
00216             setFunds(5000);
00217             setGameLevel(LEVEL_HARD);
00218             break;
00219 
00220     }
00221 }
00222

00227 void Micropolis::setGameLevel(GameLevel level)
00228 {
00229     assert(level >= LEVEL_FIRST && level <= LEVEL_LAST);
00230     gameLevel = level;
00231     updateGameLevel();
00232 }

00236 void Micropolis::updateGameLevel()
00237 {
00238     callback("update", "s", "gameLevel");
00239 }

00242 void Micropolis::setCityName(const std::string &name)
00243 {
00244     std::string cleanName;
00245 
00246     int i;
00247     int n = name.length();
00248     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00249         char ch = name[i];
00250         if (!isalnum(ch)) {
00251             ch = '_';
00252         }
00253         cleanName.push_back(ch);
00254     }
00255 
00256     setCleanCityName(cleanName);
00257 }
00258

00265 {
00266     cityName = name;
00267 
00268     callback("update", "s", "cityName");
00269 }

00272 void Micropolis::setYear(int year)
00273 {
00274     // Must prevent year from going negative, since it screws up the non-floored modulo arithmetic.
00275     if (year < startingYear) {
00276         year = startingYear;
00277     }
00278 
00279     year = (year - startingYear) - (cityTime / 48);
00280     cityTime += year * 48;
00281     doTimeStuff();
00282 }
00283 
00284 
00289 int Micropolis::currentYear()
00290 {
00291     return (cityTime / 48) + startingYear;
00292 }

00301 }

00416 void Micropolis::getDemands(
00417     float *resDemandResult,
00418     float *comDemandResult,
00419     float *indDemandResult)
00420 {
00421     *resDemandResult = (float)resValve / (float)RES_VALVE_RANGE;
00422     *comDemandResult = (float)comValve / (float)COM_VALVE_RANGE;
00423     *indDemandResult = (float)indValve / (float)IND_VALVE_RANGE;
00424 }
